channel.title: Hacker News on Virtualbeck's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hacker News on Virtualbeck's Blog

item.title: hacker news on a kindle
item.description: Have you ever wanted to get a digest of the “best” hackernews stories on your kindle? Well, look no further! I’ve cobbled together a few technologies to create and host a repo of “books” in which each book is a day of the best links from hackernews. Each chapter is an article. I had AI write most of this. If you like to contribute, great! The repo will be on github shortly.
